bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Cryostat End-Cap Dimensions for Germanium Semiconductor Gamma-Ray Spectometers
IEEE Standard Cryostat End-Cap Dimensions for Germanium Semiconductor Gamma-Ray Spectometers

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard establishes fixed dimensions for end-caps in the interests of interchangeability of cryostats from various manufacturers. Seven standard diameters and five minimum lengths are specified for the cylindrical surface separating the environment from the vacuum enclosure around the Ge crystal.<<ETX>>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
